PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_GasTerminalTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Common attributes of gas terminal types. GasProperties attribute deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcFuelProperties instead.

PropertyDef.Name: GasFlowRateRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Gas volumetric flowrate within which the gas terminal is designed to operate.
